mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `act_ru_task` t LEFT JOIN t_flow_instance i ON t.PROC_INST_ID_ = i.activiti_process_instance_id
mapper.sql: FROM ACT_RU_TASK RES1 INNER JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF D ON RES1.PROC_DEF_ID_ = D.ID_ INNER JOIN ACT_RU_VARIABLE V ON V.PROC_INST_ID_ = RES1.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I ON I.TASK_ID_ = RES1.ID_ LEFT JOIN t_flow_instance instance ON RES1.PROC_INST_ID_ = instance.activiti_process_instance_id WHERE RES1.ASSIGNEE_ IS NULL AND I.TYPE_ = 'candidate' AND ( I.USER_ID_ = #{userId} OR I.GROUP_ID_ IN (${roleIds}))
